PositionHistory.Description:
Proactive Electronic Engineer from IIT (BHU), Varanasi with diverse competence proved in the curriculum and various reputed
competitive platforms to outshine
Insightful knowledge of Data Structure, Algorithm, Operating Systems
Fruitful combination of academic expertise and leadership qualities inherent in the working style resulted into the recognition
of the team at various occasions
Strong inclination towards the IT Software Development domain and an extensive conceptual knowledge of its various
concepts including C, C++
Energetic personnel initiating to prove the savviness at various academic projects and curious to hone expertise in MATLAB,
Silvaco TCAD, Arduino-UNO
Capabilities in sustaining a dynamic environment that fosters development of opportunities & motivates high performance
amongst team members
